name: Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D
description:
This city is full of dangers – and you must be the biggest one! If you like animal simulators and horror movies about giant mutated predators, you’d love this game! Act like a fiendish beast from movie – chase citizens, cats, and dogs, attack cars and trucks! Be the most fearful creature – scaled Titanoboa snake - of these blocks with Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D!
Become the most dangerous of city animals! Stay alerted all the time and maintain your snake’s health, energy and hunger rate to survive! Beware human warfare – tanks, helicopters even usual grenade launchers could be a problem! Attack first before they can do the same thing with you!
If you feel lonely – just create a family, make the nest, lay eggs, protect it from cops – and in a couple of minutes, you would have your own bunch of deadly slithery reptiles! Earn points for successive completion of missions to upgrade your giant boa snake - change the color of skin, buy new attack or other boosters!
Have fun playing Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D!
Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D features:
Be giant boa on the city streets!
Hunt for citizens and animals
Avoid tanks and police
Lay on eggs, protect your nest and raise up your little snakes
Customize your anaconda as you want
Feel like a giant carnivorous poisonous snake and start a hunt on streets of the big city with Venom Anaconda Snake Simulator 3D!
